Articles.Content:
I was trying to make a modified version of the Mammoth engine but I ended up messing it up and putting my new modded engine in the regular engine's folder. I cant get it to load anymore so i need someone to upload a regular 1.4.5.2243 parts folder in \Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\GameData\Squad\Parts. I'm pretty sure that this is the only thing that i need but I'm not sure if changing something in the parts folder affects something somewhere else.


**EDIT** I fixed the issue by validating my game files in the steam menu. No need for any additional help.

Edited September 28, 2018 by Eggknowledged

Welcome to the forums!

Glad you sorted it out on your own.

Just to clarify though, uploading that folder would be redistributing Squad assets and wouldn't be allowed.

I would suggest to use ModuleManager. The whole point of MM is to modify gamefiles without actually altering the original file.

https://github.com/sarbian/ModuleManager/wiki/Module-Manager-Handbook

Edited September 28, 2018 by 4x4cheesecake
